org.pac4j.oauth.client

Class StravaClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pac4j.core.util.InitializableWebObject
      • org.pac4j.core.client.BaseClient<C,U>
        • org.pac4j.core.client.IndirectClient<OAuthCredentials,U>
          • org.pac4j.oauth.client.BaseOAuthClient<U>
            • org.pac4j.oauth.client.BaseOAuth20Client<StravaProfile>
              • org.pac4j.oauth.client.StravaClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Cloneable, Client<OAuthCredentials,StravaProfile>

    public class StravaClient
extends BaseOAuth20Client<StravaProfile>

    OAuth20Client for Strava.

    Use the key as the client_id and secret as the client_secret, both provided by Strava at: https://www.strava.com/settings/api

    Set approvalPrompt to "force" if you want to force the authorization dialog to always display on Strava, otherwise let it to "auto" (default value).

    More info at: http://strava.github.io/api/

    Since:
    1.7.0
    Author:
    Adrian Papusoi
